title: Quarkus 2.0.2.Final released - Maintenance release
content: We just released Quarkus 2.0.2.Final because we like symmetry (and also because we had a couple of bugfixes to publish). It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.0. If you are not using 2.0 already, please refer to the 2.0 migration guide. Full changelog You can get the...
